Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
The Academic Discovery Center is happy to announce that the Discovery Fair will now be an Internship, Career, Graduate School and Student Teaching fair and promises to be bigger and better than ever before!  Many employers and graduate schools will be in attendance so be sure to not miss out.

The Discovery Fair is designed to connect you with employers interested in recruiting for internships and entry-level positions, graduate schools interested in students attending their university's programs and school districts looking for student teachers.

The upcoming Discovery Fair will be held
Thursday, February 23rd, 2012
9a.m. - 2 p.m. in the BYU-Idaho center

Career Week Activities

Many activities are planned for students the week of the fair. These events will help you understand the importance of preparation, networking, and other activities related to successful futures.

Be sure to check the schedule for details on information sessions, group presentations, and/or individual interviews and appointments. You may search positions, interviews, and events on Career Navigator.  Also prepare for the fair by attending the following events:

Resume Café

Date: TBD
9 a.m. to 3 p.m.
MC 125C
Résumé Café is a resume workshop where students can get their résumé reviewed and receive feedback on how to best represent themselves to employers. Bring a hard-copy resume to 125C for a quick review to ensure you’re prepared for the fair!

Me in 30 Seconds Presentations

Date: TBD
11 a.m. – 1 p.m.
Crossroads Stage
Join us at ‘Me in Thirty Seconds’, where students will practice explaining their thirty-second-self to employers. The drill is also called an ‘elevator pitch”, describing a limited time an individual may have to explain who they are, why they’re marketable, and why an employer should hire them. Prizes will be awarded to the students with the best presentations.

Discovery Fair

Date: TBD
9 a.m. – 2 p.m.
Gain a Clear Vision For Your Future!
Over 100 booths to help you gain a clear vision for your future. Whether you’re looking for a job, internships, career or graduate school, this is the place you’ll want to be. Also watch for additional information sessions and interviews during the week. Check out our website at www.byui.edu/academic-discovery-center for a list of companies and schools attending, preparation tips, and more.
